title: Linux su Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux su command and learn how to switch users, manage privileges, and execute commands with elevated permissions.

meta.title: Linux su Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux su command and learn how to switch users, manage privileges, and execute commands with elevated permissions.
meta.keywords: Linux, su command, user management, privilege management, command execution

verify.name: Verify user switching
verify.hint: Ensure that you can successfully switch to the root user using the `su` command.

verify.name: Verify user switching
verify.hint: Ensure that you can successfully switch to the labex user using the `su` command.

verify.name: Verify package installation
verify.hint: Ensure that you can successfully install the htop package using the su or sudo command.
